author: hiranya
msg: Improved the multi XML config builder to read a synapse.xml file in the specified directory to build the Synapse configuration from. The local-entries.xml file was removed from the config builder (such things should go in the synapse.xml from now on). Updated the config serializer as necessary.

The logic which creates default main and fault sequences in the SynapseXMLConfigurationFactory was moved to SynapseConfigurationBuilder where it can be shared across multiple config builder implementations.

author: lofwyr
msg: - clean up class names because of naming conventions: UIDate, UITime (was UIDateInput, UITimeInput)
